Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/Cullerton
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Cermak, Ashland, 18th and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/Cullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Cermak, Ashland, 18th and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/Cullerton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express and Temporary Reroute at Ashland/27th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are rerouted via Ashland, Service Orange Line, Archer, Loomis, Cermak & Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Service Orange Line, Archer, Loomis, Cermak & Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/27th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Western
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses rerouted EB: Jackson, California, Congress, Damen & Jackson; WB Van Buren, California & Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near, due to street blockage near Jackson/Western.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, California, Congress, Damen & Jackson.

Westbound buses will operate via Van Buren, California & Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.
